title: Drawing, Nude of a man, 1825–50
medium: Black and white crayon on brown paper; verso: pencil on brown paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: The man is shown seated and turned toward right. The left foot stands higher than the right one and the right forearm leans leans upon the left thigh. The left arm is turned backward; verso: in opposite direction: three-quarter of a standing girl. The left hand lies upon the breast, the right one is lowered.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Nude of a man, 1825–50. Black and white crayon on brown paper; verso: pencil on brown paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-603
